sections.aboutText: Telecommunications Engineer with 8+ years of experience in Business Intelligence and Data Engineering. Specialized in data visualization, ETL processes, and analytical solutions across large-scale corporate projects (HP, Puig, Seat, Cosentino, Mutua Universal). Currently expanding skills in Python and backend development, leveraging strong foundation in SQL, data architecture, and problem-solving.

projects.intro: Personal projects developed in my free time to explore new technologies and expand my development skills.

wedding.title: Wedding Website
wedding.description: Complete wedding website with RSVP form, photo gallery, and guest management. Frontend connected to Google Sheets using Apps Script for data collection.

nodejs.title: NodeJS + Azure Project
nodejs.description: End-to-end web application with SharePoint frontend, custom NodeJS API, and MySQL database hosted on Azure. Implements authentication, CRUD operations, and real-time data synchronization.

powerbi.title: Power BI Advanced Solutions
powerbi.description: Collection of advanced Power BI dashboards featuring custom JavaScript visualizations, complex DAX calculations, and innovative data storytelling techniques.

cv.title: Interactive CV
cv.description: This responsive, multi-language CV built with vanilla JavaScript, featuring theme switching, smooth animations, and professional design patterns.
